title: Huawei Watch_Can I use my Huawei Watch to initiate a call? How can I use my Huawei Watch to initiate a call?
answer:
You can use your watch to initiate calls to contacts in your watch's contacts list. Swipe to the contacts list, touch a contact, and then select **Call** to initiate the call.

Although you can use your watch to initiate calls, you must use your phone to make the call.
faqType: SIM Card, SMS, Calls, and Contacts
